attributes.action: now allow the people who pay for ministers and MPs lavish expenses - the taxpayer - to also vote their own pay and tax free allowances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the abomination of MPs and Ministers refusing to agree to changes to their extravagant and ENTIRELY unjustified regime of being allowed expenses totally unrelated to the cost of carrying out the job it will be immoral to continue to refuse to allow the voters to choose their own levels of income tax and tax free allowances.  To do otherwise is to violate the Human Right of Equal Treatment.
